vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Related to: ἀλλοτριο-επίσκοπος, ὁ,
busybody in other men's matters, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: meddler, busybody; formally rendered "one who oversees what belongs to another" (in an unwarranted manner)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
meddler, busybody; formally rendered "one who oversees what belongs to another" (in an unwarranted manner)
primarily one who meddles with the affairs of others, a busybody in other men's matters; factious, 1Pet. 4:15*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: entrometido, alguien que interfiere en los asuntos de otros, perturbador
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 插手原屬別人的事務又作不出什麼的有意義的處理, 好管他人閒事的人 (彼前 4:15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 插手原属别人的事务又作不出什么的有意义的处理, 好管他人闲事的人 (彼前 4:15)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: kẻ xen vào việc người khác ; kẻ thày lay việc người khác ; người tố giác
